creator: egli@apache.org
text:
The files ac.xconf, publisher.xconf, targets.xml and and tasks.xconf contain
hardcoded context and publication-id.

Check this for the default publication but I'm sure it's true for others.

creator: andreas@apache.org
text: ac.xconf does not contain a hard-coded context prefix.

publisher.xconf, targets.xml and and tasks.xconf are deprecated in 1.4. I'm
setting this issue to fixed, please reopen if you object.
creator: andreas@apache.org
